## Tree.createSnapshot() method

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Creates a snapshot of the current version of the tree.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createSnapshot(dir: string, chunkSize?: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dir | string | The folder in which the snapshot should be written. |
|  chunkSize | number | The maximum size of each chunk. Could end up to be slightly more. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;
